Content.Text:
<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good day, <MYNAME>. I see you've finally
completed your barn.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, you haven't forgotten my promise, have
you? Once you'd built a barn, I would acquire a
horse for you.
<PAGE>
I have come to honor that agreement. However,
there is one condition. It is...

<NAME_MOB_JUDY>
Oh! Y-yes, my lady. We would like <BLUE>5 bottles of
milk</BLUE>.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yes, that's what it was. We must keep our stores
of milk high so that my maids can continue to
make my cakes uninterrupted.
<PAGE>
So for now, bring 5 bottles of milk to my
manor. Once you've done so, I will see to
acquiring your horse.
<PAGE>
Feel free to call on me any day except Sundays.
A lady needs her weekend rest, you know.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That will be all for today. I await your visit. Ta-
ta!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It looks like you're a little too late. I've heard that
one can now buy horses at the Silk Country stall
in the Trade Depot.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You said you couldn't find a place that sells
horses here, so I thought I'd do you a favor and
use my connections to find one for you.
<PAGE>
But if you can waltz down to the Trade Depot
and simply purchase one, it seems you have
little need of my assistance.
<PAGE>
They seem a tad on the expensive side, but if
you'd like a horse, well, there they are.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That will be all for today. Ta-ta.
